We offer our customers 1st class VPS and Dedicated Server hosting services in Thailand/Asia, to a fair and affordable price.

Included Features
  • Choose IP range
    You can choose IP from 2 different subnets when you order!
  • We use Proxmox Virtual Environment
    Proxmox VE is an enterprise virtualization platform with support for KVM and LXC virtualization technologies, one of the most stable VE platforms on the market.
  • Our servers are made for VPS provisioning
    All our enterprise server hardware is allocated to give the most to your VPS, we never oversell - what you purchase, you get.
  • Choice of OS
    You will have a variety of Linux distributions available to choose between, or add OS of your choice by sending a request to us.
  • VPS cPanel
    Control your VPS through cPanel client area or CLI, with the options of (re)installing, rebooting, shutdown, backup and take snapshots etc.
  • Your VPS is ready to use within minutes
    We guarantee you do not have to wait hours for your VPS to be ready.
  • 24/7/365 English Speaking Support
    With your Thailand VPS follows quick support via our Live Chat or integrated ticket system.
  • Option to Pay with Bitcoin, PayPal and 2checkout
    We require only one confirmation when Bitcoin is your choice of payment method, guarantee that whichever option of payment you choose it is fast and secure.

If you choose to pay more than 1 month ahead there will be a discount on your VPS, depending on how many months you want to pay in advance the % of discount look like this:

  • 3 month/ 5% discount
  • 6 month/ 7% discount
  • 12 month/ 10% discount
